title: Rebel Wisdom is hiring! Editorial Assistant wanted
description:
We are looking for an editorial assistant to join the team and help us grow the channel. 

The main part of the job will be to edit videos and make clips - write copy - upload to the different content channels - create title cards and other assets, and keeping across other admin for the business. 

The ideal person would have at least a couple of years' experience in content production and needs to be a confident editor. 

They would be familiar with photoshop, editing software (ideally Avid Media Composer), and content management systems.

 Ability to write well and potentially contribute ideas will also be useful. The role has scope to develop into other areas such as commissioning graphics and other video production areas.

if that might be you - send in your details to david@rebelwisdom.co.uk - or if you know who this should be - send this onto a friend...
